fields.name: FC25 (Xbox Series X)
fields.description: EA SPORTS FC™ 25 has the best players from the biggest clubs and competitions around the globe, with match data from the world’s top leagues powering how 19,000+ players from 700+ authentic clubs move, play, and win in every match.

fields.name: Beats Studio Pro
fields.description: The Beats Studio Pro custom acoustic platform delivers an immersive listening experience. Each custom 40mm driver has been engineered for optimal clarity, with near-zero distortion even at high volume — an improvement of up to 80% compared to Beats Studio3, providing increased audio fidelity. An integrated digital processor optimises the final frequency response for a powerful yet balanced sound profile, crafted to bring out the subtle details of whatever you are listening to.

fields.name: Call of Duty Black Ops 6 (Xbox Series X)
fields.description: Black Ops 6 is a spy action thriller set in the early 90s, a period of transition and upheaval in global politics, characterised by the end of the Cold War and the rise of the United States as a single superpower. With a mind-bending narrative, and unbound by the rules of engagement, this is signature Black Ops across a cinematic single-player Campaign, a best-in-class Multiplayer experience, and with the epic return of Round-Based Zombies.

fields.name: JBL Go 4 Portable Speaker
fields.description: The JBL Go 4 fits in the palm of your hand, delivering JBL Pro Sound with rich, punchy bass. It's both dustproof and waterproof, meaning that you can take it with you in any weather.

fields.name: LG OLED 65 inch
fields.description: The LG OLED C4 also boasts an impressive collection of smart features like built-in voice control and a slick user-interface that makes daily operation a breeze. And it’s the perfect TV for gamers looking for next-gen support, with a collection of advanced gaming features like 4K/120Hz and lightning-fast response times.

fields.name: Ninja Foodi Flexdrawer Airfryer
fields.description: Introducing Ninja Foodi FlexDrawer, the extra-large capacity air fryer that adapts to fit every meal. Cook in 2 independent cooking zones with Ninja’s signature Dual Zone Technology, or remove the divider to cook larger foods in the 10.4L MegaZone.

fields.name: Oral-B Pro 1000 Electric Toothbrush
fields.description: Oral-B Pro 1000 Rechargeable Electric Toothbrush, Black, 1-count, provides a clinically proven superior deep clean in hard-to-reach areas vs. a regular manual toothbrush. 300% MORE plaque removal along the gumline versus a regular manual toothbrush.

fields.name: Xbox Series X Console
fields.description: Introducing Xbox Series X, the fastest, most powerful Xbox ever. Play thousands of titles from four generations of consoles – all games look and play best on Xbox Series X.

fields.name: Nintendo Switch Lite - Coral
fields.description: If you are looking for a gaming system all your own, Nintendo Switch Lite is ready to hit the road whenever you are.

fields.name: Meta Quest 3 VR Headset
fields.description: Explore extraordinary new experiences in mixed reality with the most powerful Meta Quest yet.

fields.name: Vive Focus 3
fields.description: Introducing the all-in-one VIVE Focus 3. Delivering best-in-class graphics, ergonomic comfort and applications that will transform the way you work.

fields.name: Withings Body Smart Scales
fields.description: The scale that performs a powerful checkup. Unrivalled assessments: fat and muscle percentage, cardiovascular risk assessment, and detection of certain early signs of diabetes-related complications.

fields.name: Dyson V15 Cordless Vacuum
fields.description: Powerful. Intelligent. Versatile. For whole-home deep cleaning. With HEPA filtration and up to 60 minutes of run time.

fields.name: Roomba J7 Robot Vacuum
fields.description: Wi-Fi-connected Robot Vacuum that identifies and avoids obstacles like pet waste and charging cords to get the whole job done.

fields.name: Ninja StaySharp 14-Piece Stainless Knife Set
fields.description: Forged from German stainless steel, famed for its strength and durability, these premium knives feature a full tang design: each blade is created from a single piece of steel, with the tang extending the entire length of the handle for optimal durability, strength, and stability.
